Posts.Content: Jun 11, 2010 01:51PM pabarrn wrote: I was recently had a core needle bx and was dx with a PASH.  A mass was found on U/S and not mamography. I was told to wait 6 months and repeat my ultrasound.  Everything I have read says that the entire PASH should be excised.  Any suggeastions as to what I should do?
